SEARCH
Package serverCode

Class HttpServerProxy

java.lang.Object
serverCode.HttpServerProxy
public class HttpServerProxy extends Object
Acts as a client-side proxy to communicate with an external HTTP server using RESTful endpoints. Supports operations for searching, adding, and removing music records.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Represents a generic HTTP service request used by HttpServerProxy.

      public HttpServerProxy(String serverHost, String serverPort, String charset)
      Constructs a proxy with specified server host, port, and charset.
      Parameters:
      serverHost - host of the target server
      serverPort - port of the target server
      charset - character encoding (e.g., "UTF-8")

      public HttpServerProxy(String serverHost, String serverPort)
      Constructs a proxy with the given server host and port using UTF-8 as the default charset.
      Parameters:
      serverHost - host of the target server
      serverPort - port of the target server

    • connectToServer

      private String connectToServer(HttpServerProxy.GenericService service) throws IOException
      Sends an HTTP request to the server with the specified service configuration and returns the response body.
      Parameters:
      service - the HttpServerProxy.GenericService configuration containing the request metadata
      Returns:
      the response body as a String
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • searchMusic

      public ResSearchMusic searchMusic(ReqSearchMusic request)
      Sends a search request to the music search endpoint. Calls connectToServer(GenericService)
      Parameters:
      request - the ReqSearchMusic object containing the query
      Returns:
      the ResSearchMusic response, or null on failure

    • addMusic

      public ResAddMusic addMusic(ReqAddMusic request)
      Sends a request to add a new music record to the server. Calls connectToServer(GenericService)
      Parameters:
      request - the ReqAddMusic object containing the record to add
      Returns:
      the ResAddMusic response, or null on failure

    • removeMusic

      public ResRemoveMusic removeMusic(ReqRemoveMusic request)
      Sends a request to remove a music record from the server. Calls connectToServer(GenericService)
      Parameters:
      request - the ReqRemoveMusic object specifying what to remove
      Returns:
      the ResRemoveMusic response, or null on failure

      Returns:
